attributes.action: stop the discrimination of lung cancer patients in England and ensure that they have access to the drug Tarceva!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an absolute disgrace that patients, like my father, are being denied the drug Tarceva - which is available free in Scotland - and can only obtain this treatment by paying for it privately! NICE needs a kick up the back side and so do the health authorities who hide behind this organisation's dilly-dallying, using it as an excuse to deny dying patients a better, longer quality of life!
